name: Means Of Escape
description:
Are you Fairy enough to find everything you need to escape the cave in this Micro-vania 48-hour made game.

The core idea behind this game was the simple idea of an out of control Metroid-vania where you have to explore as much as possible before the level destroys itself, sealing you inside, with nowhere else to explore.

Lead Developer & Musician;

Joseph Crowe-Delderfield

Art Director;

Wiktor M Leszczynski

Story and Art;

Eden Shellabear-Sanchez

Environmental Design & Animation;

Ella King
